duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinates and manages all travel logistics for patients and caregivers, including air travel, accommodations, and ground transportation, optimizing patient care and satisfaction.
Books patient travel and ground transportation, ensuring timely and satisfactory ticket procurement within policy guidelines.
Books patient accommodations utilizing hospital hotel management system and area hotels, ensuring reservations are within policy guidelines.
Enters all travel activity into hospital scheduling systems, ensuring patient and provider schedules reflect travel plans.
Prepares and processes mileage reimbursement requests for qualifying patients in a timely manner.
Accommodates patient's special needs with airlines and hotels within policy guidelines.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, college experience preferred
